titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4137) to amend and extend the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-808, by Ms. Matsui.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 257.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1389.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/30/2008--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4137) to amend and extend the Higher Education Act of 1965.
